text: @GeorgeTakei The American/jap internment camps during ww2 were F'd up. But I understand the tuff spot our gov was in. As far as covid19... I dont know who that shits on but I certainly dont think it's on Japanese-americans. Unfortunately racism will ALWAYS exist. We just have 2 do better.
